DOC.brief_summary: This study seek determine effectiveness Strain Counterstrain treatment chronic ankle instability .
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim determine effect Strain Counterstrain ( SCS ) dynamic balance subjective sense instability individual chronic ankle instability ( CAI ) . Although many study publish CAI , cause common clinical dysfunction remain inconclusive . No study assess effectiveness SCS CAI . Baseline information participant include demographic questionnaire , Star Excursion Balance Test ( SEBT ) , Foot Ankle Ability Measure ( FAAM ) . Participants randomize SCS intervention group sham SCS control group . All participant receive intervention ( assign ) week four week addition perform prescribe home exercise program . At week four participant repeat outcome measure complete Global Rating Change ( GROC ) form . The primary aim examine 2-way analysis variance ( ANOVA ) .
DOC.criteria: history least 1 ankle sprain , pain and/or limp 1 day , least 3 month earlier 3 episode ankle give way last 12 month chronic instability attribute original sprain injury age 1855 history fracture surgery affect ankle low extremity musculoskeletal injury side involve ankle vestibular dysfunction disorder history balance dysfunction history stroke neurological pathology disease history ACL injury current participation physical therapy rehabilitation ankle injury evidence CNS dysfunction
